thread.title: Watch: More than 100 passengers left behind in Poole
thread.title_full: Watch: More than 100 passengers left behind in Poole | Channel - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Watch: More than 100 passengers left behind in Poole
text:
More than 100 passengers have been left stranded in Poole this evening, after another day of problems for the Condor Liberation .
A technical glitch meant the boat had been overbooked this morning. Anger flared among those at the port, and some blockaded the boat. Dorset Police were called in and more passengers were unable to board.
It is unknown the exact number who were left behind, but 70 were left unbooked and another 69 cars - and their passengers - were unable to board because of the chaos.
Andrea Bishop reports on another day of delays.
